name: react-json-csv-convert
description: React-JSON-CSV is a powerful npm package that allows you to effortlessly convert JSON data to CSV format directly within your React app. With React-JSON-CSV, you can easily perform various preprocessing steps before converting your data, such as combining multiple fields in your JSON into a single CSV field, searching for values from an object based on a field in your JSON, and formatting the data before adding it to the CSV. With its intuitive interface and robust functionality, React-JSON-CSV is the perfect solution for developers looking to streamline their data conversion process.
author: Daud Ahmed

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && NODE_ENV=production babel src/lib --out-dir dist --copy-files
